name: Pereulok: The Series
description: Pereulok: The Series is an intricate adventure in the open world, and only few lovers of non-ordinary stories can disentangle these issues. The action takes place in 1901 in a small alley – pereulok – in the southern city of the Russian Empire.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: with 512 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
